mapper.select: select td.subject from timetable_detail td join timetable t on td.timetable_id = t.timetable_id where t.timetable_id = #{timetableId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TIMETABLE_DETAIL (SUBJECT_ID, timetable_id, DAY , START_TIME , END_TIME , CLASSROOM , SUBJECT , PROFESSOR) VALUES (timetable_detail_seq.NEXTVAL, #{timetable_id}, #{day}, #{start_time}, #{end_time}, #{classroom}, #{subject}, #{professor})
